Key Arguments: The proposed legislation would give the Australian Communication and Media Authority (ACMA) excessive power to make and enforce its own rules about industry standards and content.
There is a fear that such power could lead to complete media control similar to what is observed in countries like Russia and China.
Main Themes: Concerns about media freedom and control
Notable Quotes: We see what has happened in Russia and China with complete Media Control and we don't want that here in Australia.
